title: The Xayah and Rakan login music is so awesome

replies.body:
Thanks for your kind words :) I had a great time working on the music for these guys

<3

this is what music team did right... i mean personally,the music isnt into my taste i like some other ones you guys did before more BUT :

1- music fits the characters profiles well
2- it gave me a almost perfect idea of how music of Vastaya would sound like.
3- its distinctive compared to the music of other cultures/lands of league's universe so it speaks for its cultural diversity and makes it more realistic and alive 

when i hear Freljord theme i can clearly picture a frozen hell with its people who has been through such hardships and are struggling to keep alive with each passing day.there is this certain feel of depressing cold in its music yet the woman's voice in the background (wish i knew her name) makes my heart warm and is in great contrast with that depressing feeling.

it makes me feel sad for their people and admire their strength that they keep on going with war and the brutality of their harsh homeland.!something i couldn't feel when i was reading the lore alone.not to mention how much it makes me think and feel about Sejuani and her tribe.

and when i hear this new theme i can imagine the colorful performances of rakan (even tho i hate that guy) and how people would be attracted to these ...traditional? musics of their land.

what im trying to say is that to me,you guys...the music team... is giving league's universe life. it becomes more than just words on paper as music has such a complex and amazing connection with one's mind , soul and emotions! 

and for this you have my deepest thanks guys!

P.S: maybe i should have made a seperate topic for this reply! i think i will if Ed miss my reply.
